sass-seed » Mixins

Mixin to @include Material Design box-shadows to your components to simulate depth and elevation; levels 1 - 5.

Since v1.0.0

Author:

  • William Pansky

Parameters

$depth: 1 (Number)

Determines the depth, or elevation, of your component’s box-shadow

Example

html 
```
  .card {
    @include materialShadow(1);
    &:hover, &:focus {
      @include materialShadow(4);
    }
  }
```

Related

Material.io | Elevation & shadows [external]

Codepen.io | Material design box shadows via Samuel Thornton [external]

Soft shadows forked via UIkit [external]
